quantity.mainAdvice: What is your practice list size?

expandableSection.title: What list size should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: This figure is usually the number of patients registered with the Service Recipient. If you're unsure how this relates to your order you can contact the helpdesk using the link at the bottom of the page.

expandableSection.title: What price should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: Enter the price you've agreed with the supplier. We've included the list price, but this can be changed if required.

expandableSection.title: What price should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: You can change the list price if you've agreed a different rate with the supplier.

errorMessages.PriceMoreThan4dp: Price must be to a maximum of 4 decimal places
errorMessages.PriceLessThanMax: Maximum price exceeded, enter a lower price
errorMessages.PriceGreaterThanListPrice: You’ve entered a price that is more than the list price, enter a lower price
errorMessages.QuantityMustBeANumber: Practice list size must be a number
errorMessages.QuantityInvalid: Practice list size must be a whole number
errorMessages.QuantityGreaterThanZero: Practice list size must be greater than zero
errorMessages.QuantityLessThanMax: Maximum practice list size exceeded, enter a lower number
errorMessages.DeliveryDateInvalid: Enter a planned delivery date in a valid format
errorMessages.DeliveryDateOutsideDeliveryWindow: Planned delivery date must be within 42 months from the commencement date for this Call-off Agreement
errorMessages.DeliveryDateNotReal: Planned delivery date must be a real date
errorMessages.DeliveryDateDayRequired: Planned delivery date must include a day
errorMessages.DeliveryDateMonthRequired: Planned delivery date must include a month
errorMessages.DeliveryDateYearRequired: Planned delivery date must include a year
errorMessages.DeliveryDateYearLength: Year must be four numbers, for example 2020

expandableSection.title: What practice list size should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent:
Enter the amount you wish to order. This is usually based on each Service Recipient's practice list size to help calculate an estimated price, but the figure can be changed if required.

As you’re ordering per patient, we've included each practice list size if we have it. If it's not included, you'll need to add it yourself.

expandableSection.title: What date should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent:
Enter the planned delivery date you've agreed with the supplier. This is the day that each of the listed Service Recipients will start using this Additional Service.

We've included the commencement date for this Call-off Agreement, but you can change it if you’ve agreed a different delivery date.
